me kathawa kochchi pettiyaka wuna sathya siddhiyak.api dannawane kochchi pettiwala gaෲp innawa kiyala.me gaෲp hama deyakma karanne kochchiye.barthde patida arawada mewwada okkoma.hungak denek pawul kanneth kochchi pettiye.ithin me widiyata sit badu aran hitapuwama gaෲp ekata ayithi nathi kenekuta hadisi gamanak ehema yanna wunoth deyiyangema pihita thamayi.sit eken thallu karalama danawa.wadath mlechchama de kiri daruwek athe aran inna amma kenekuta nagitinna siddha wuna gaෲp eke anum banum nisa.meka mama ahin dakapu siddhiyakee amma aduwa.eeka paththakin thiyamu.ape kathawata bahimu.
